long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple mouse gesture functions.

------------------------------------------
right button click and move
------------------------------------------
U = UP
D = DOWN
L = LEFT
R = RIGHT

---------------------
normal gestures
---------------------
UD  = reload
UDU = super reload
DR  = close
L   = back
R   = forward
D   = new tab
DU  = new tab(background)

---------------------
link gestures
---------------------
link+D   = new tab
link+DU  = new tab(background)
